<center>### [**Dr. Charlotte Rafaluk-Mohr**](http://www.thekinglab.com/dr-charlotte-rafaluk-mohr/)
<center>#### Freie Universität Berlin
<div style= "float:left;position: relative; right: 30px; top: -7px;">
![](/home/cmanthey/Schreibtisch/Github_files/EcoEvoPhDMeeting2020/EcoEvoPhDMeeting2020.github.io/pics/Charlotte.JPG){width=150px}
</div>
<br>
<br>
<div style="text-align: justify">
Host-defensive mutualist-parasite system, where *Caenorhabditis elegans* is the host, *Enterococcus faecalis* is the defensive mutualist and *Staphylococcus aureus* is the parasite. Experimental evolution to ask how parasites influence coevolutionary dynamics and outcomes between hosts and defensive mutualists and how defensive mutualists influence the outcomes and dynamics of host-parasite coevolution.
</div>
